org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class LegendLabels

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.LegendLabels

  • public class LegendLabels
extends Object
    This is the labels configuration of the legend.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      Returns if label style will match corresponding point style (size is based on fontSize, boxWidth is not used in this case).
      void merge(NativeObjectContainer source, String property)
      Merge a native object into this one with a specific property name.
      This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration into options of chart.

      • merge

        public final void merge(NativeObjectContainer source,
                        String property)
        Merge a native object into this one with a specific property name.
        This is used by plugins implementation (native java script ones) when they are not using the standard way to add plugin configuration into options of chart.

        property - property name
